content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2.5, 2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Small electric pole (position 2.5, 2.5)

### Lab at position(3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Lab (position 3, 0) which is currently not powered

### Copper plate factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Furnace (position 0, 0) with coal as fuel
-  Furnace (position 2, 0) with coal as fuel
-  Wooden chest (position 3.5, 0.5) with no items

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing new pole
- Ensure that the first argument is a valid Prototype object before attempting to place a new pole.

### Errors when the lab is not powered
- Check the power supply to the lab and ensure it is connected to a power source.

### Errors when research cannot be completed
- Ensure you have the required ingredients (in this case, 10 automation science packs) to complete the research.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
